content.content: On Tuesday, July 28th (tomorrow) at 12 pm EST / 4:00 p.m UTC, I will be running a MIP17 Working Group Community Call. Context Given that MIP17 was initially rejected from the Governance Cycle this month and that there has been a lot recent of discussion on how to improve/modify the proposal to meet Maker’s needs, I think holding a community call to discuss our options going forward is a great idea in order to prepare it for resubmission. Agenda  I will summarize all the comments/points in the forum thread + some other options to consider and present it on the call for all to catch up Open discussion Next steps for proposal editing Determine if we need another call Finalize proposal The final sentiment gauging before resubmission via a forum poll (optional) Once it’s reached a level of rough consensus, the Author(s) will propose it for resubmission to the next available Governance Cycle  Call Details  Zoom Link Password: 167045
content.GPT-summary: The author of a proposal, MIP17, is hosting a community call to discuss how to improve and modify the proposal after it was initially rejected from the Governance Cycle. The call will include a summary of comments and points from the forum thread, open discussion, determining next steps for editing the proposal, and finalizing it before resubmission. The author is seeking feedback and constructive criticism from third parties and is open to answering questions and having the proposal audited and reviewed.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
